RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Southern District of Texas: United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court for the Sou: held a preliminary examination hearing in the case of Yusif Ahmed Rufied and found probable cause to hold him, conducted a hearing on June 2, 2006, and issued a finding of probable cause on June 7, 2006, held a preliminary examination hearing to determine whether there was probable cause to detain Yusif Ahmed Rufied
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE: presented Agent Bruce Henderson as its sole witness at the preliminary examination hearing and interviewed Martin Adaboh, investigated alien smuggling at Diesel Impact 2000, presented Agent Bruce Henderson as its sole witness
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted a check point on Highway 59 where sixty undocumented aliens were found in a tractor trailer and stopped Yusif Ahmed Rufied, checked for loads and aliens, conducted a secondary inspection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Monterrey Inn: location where Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh stayed, and where Martin Adaboh was approached to smuggle aliens by Claudia
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Diesel Impact 2000: location where aliens were loaded into the tractor trailer, off of Highway 359 with a rough caliche road leading to it, area described by Martin Adaboh to Agent Bruce Henderson
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country with a magistrate judge system and presented Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) as part of its government at the preliminary examination hearing, has laws regarding undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ghana: country of origin for Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Quebec: province in Canada where Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh live
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Montreal: city in Quebec, Canada where Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh reside
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Canada: country where Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh live, destination for a load pickup
